short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enrolup is a free software for universities and education providers which shows how to improve conversions for course website pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enrolup is a free software which allows users to analyse an unlimited number of course website pages for their conversion potential. 

Enrol more students by learning how to optimise your course website pages to attract and convert students better.

This software is ideal for universities, colleges and any education provider with course pages on their website.

The software tests for 15 conversion factors specifically for course website pages and provides a pass or fail for each factor. 

The software also provides feedback to improve conversions and allows users to download a report summarising the analysis and feedback.
